"Interesting. And every house a human's family owns has name like that?"

"No,it's just...Never mind." Shaking your head as trying to think of a way to explain it better. You open the fence to the O'Neil's house and stand in front of it. You try to open the front door, but as you already suspected it was locked.

"You know how to open a lock?" You ask Squawg but he just looks confused. There was no way you could be opening a locked door. You needed another way inside. Pulling Squawg you motion him to follow you to the back of the house. He nods to your command as you make your way to the tall grass to the backside of the house.

The O'Neil's weren't the kind of people to look after their garden. It was a mess. The grass was growing way too long, there was an umbrella lying on a sandpit April would have used. There is something familiar about it, but you decide not to pay any attention to it. Moving the backdoor reveals it's locked as well.

"Damn." You mutter as things aren't as going as you hoped for.

"What's wrong?" Squawg asks while whispering.

"We need to find a way inside the house, but everything is locked." You explain to him. Squawg looks around himself and then points to something. "What about that?" He asks you.

You see he points to a doggy flap. The O'Neils owned a dog, Sparky you think his name was. They never boarded the thing up after he died. There is only one thing.

"I'm way too big to get through it." You tell him.

"You are, but I'm not." Squawg tells you as he already drops to his knees and crawls right through it.

"Wait, Squawg." You tell him as you don't hope he will leave you out here alone in this cold. Seconds pass as you don't hear anything, but then a gentle click is heard. The door opens up and you see Squawg's goofy face looking at you.

"Thanks." You tell him as you quickly enter the house and close the door behind you gently. Inside it's pretty dark, but this must be the pantry judging from the washing machine in the corner. It's quiet as the only sounds you hear are your heavy breathing and Squawg's slight wheezing.

"We'd better not try to talk too much, in case they hear us." You point upwards. Squawg nods and you both move quietly forward. You enter the kitchen. It was spotless, Mr and Mrs.O'Neil were highly successful business people so what did you expect. Their furniture was expensive noticing a humongous TV on the wall as you sneaked through the lounge. Why did April feel the need to bully you if her life was so good?

Ending up in the hallway you look up the stairs. There was not a sound coming from upstairs which meant you and Squawg weren't discovered yet. Now you needed to climb the stairs, each step you take you wait a second to make sure nobody hears you. Squawg doesn't understand you as he pushes you forward making you lose your balance and falling down on the stairs hurting your jaw. You rub it as you frown at Squawg for doing that. He just pushes you forward, probably excited about what was to come.

You and Squawg end up in the second floor hallway. There are several rooms to choose from. It would be a waste of time searching through them together. You point to Squawg and at the furthest door. He understands the signal and goes off to check it out. Meanwhile you quietly open the door in front of you. As silent as you try to squeeze your head through the door to check out whose room it is. Turns out it's...
111112211111.title: Go to the O' Neil house.

1111122111112.content:
Opening the door you see a somewhat larger room, similar to the one your parents own. Probably because all houses in the neighborhood were build by the same contractor and the guy just build them all the same. The room is dark but the moon shines giving you a little bit of light. You see at the other end of the room a large bed where Mr and Mrs.O'Neil were sleeping soundly. While looking around you can smell the faint smell of alcohol, something strong. Hesitation makes you ponder your moves. Were you really going to take over this woman's body? Was this the best you got? Looking at the other side of the hallway you didn't see Squawg anywhere. This is your only option.

Taking a deep breath you push the door open trying to fit through. Sadly you need the door more than half wide open to pass through the gap, something telling you to work on your condition. You listen carefully if Mrs. O'Neil, Anna you're going to call her, wakes up, but you only hear the sound of her snoozing. Relieved you close the door behind you as quiet as possible. Now the only thing you have to do is get closer.

Tiptoeing isn't your favorite pastime, when you used to play hide and seek when you were younger you were always found due to your clumsiness of being heard while trying to sneak away from your hiding spot. Trying not to think about it, you step forward with your left foot and then move your right foot next to it. But after taking a few steps you suddenly feel something wet underneath your feet. Your first reaction is to scream, but quickly put your hands in front of your mouth muffling your scream away. Looking down you see the shape of a bottle lying on it's side. The bottle probably spilled it's content and you stepped into it. Gross.

"Yes. You, finally." You suddenly hear Anna saying. Your heart goes straight to your throat as Anna found out about you. Looking straight up while trying to think of an excuse, you see Anna looking the other way. She is probably dreaming. You catch your breath as you feel years have been taking off you.

Tiptoeing forward you finally reach the bed after narrowing avoiding another bottle on the ground. Anna is facing the other way from where you are standing. That way it will be easier to take her over.

Uh oh. You suddenly feel panicking all of a sudden. Squawg actually never told you how to take over someone else. You hadn't given it much thought, imagining Squawg being there to help you. But now he isn't around, leaving you to deal with it yourself. The only clue you had was when Squawg took over your mother's body. Reminding the image of Squawg opening your mum's butt hole as he made his way inside, magically enlarging the entrance. Looking at the watch it's all black, would it really give you the possibility to do it as Squawg had? There is only one way to find out.

I can do this. I can do this. You keep remembering as you quietly enter the bed Anna is sleeping in. The bed creaks from under your weight and again you feel your heart in your throat. Luckily for you Anna must be far away not to notice you. You move your body closer to Anna's making sure to keep enough distance from her. When close enough you can't help admire the beautiful red hair lying on her shoulders. It could do with a cut, to remove the "dead ends" as your sister usually told your mother.

Then you finally move your head underneath the sheets. It's a bit hot here and when you look at Anna next to you, you feel yourself getting warmer. She is wearing a transparent nightgown, showing off her backside and underneath it her jiggly ass contained in a pair of panties. Your member twitches at the sight of this. This has to be happening soon.

But unlike Squawg you can't just remove the panties in one swoop, They would remain stuck at one side. So you have another plan. Crawling closer you hope this works, else you're going to be in so much trouble for doing this.

You grab hold of the panties, making sure not to touch the skin and pull them back. The material is pretty stretchy so there is just enough room for one arm. Possession, possession, possession, you keep repeating like a mantra as you move your arm inside the panties and into the ass it was covering. Imagining your arm would touch Anna's butt hole you're somewhat bewildered as you manage to put your whole arm inside. The inside feels slimy, jiggly, you can feel some kind of walls at the sides. You, you couldn't believe it. This really worked!

"Hmm." You hear Anna suddenly moaning. Looking up, it seems Anna's body relaxes. Weird, but useful. Now that it seems safe, you put your other arm inside the gap as well as your head. Catching a whiff of her panties before plunging into some kind of tunnel, it's just wide enough to make you pass. Looking at it you notice it looks alive, as the walls keep expanding and contracting. Really weird. Not to mention the fact that your feet are still outside and touching the softness of the bed while your upper body is in here. You need to reel your lower body in as well. Swimming wasn't an option as you barely have enough movement for your arms but you could just wriggle your way up, just like a caterpillar. Slowly you move your upwards. Not knowing how long it will take, you just keep your vision in front of you and try to think happy things. How you soon would be off to an adventure, how you are going to tell Tom all about this, how awesome this is going to turn out.

"Yuck." You say out loud. With that last movement your feet are inside as well, feeling them touching the living walls. You hope this is going to be over soon. The heat inside increases, you're glad you listened to Squawg to remove your clothes. Wearing them would be a death sentence in here. And then you see something weird. There is a black hole in front of you. The size of an arm of a leg. Could it be that? You dare to look up and to your surprise you see that your journey is over. You can see a few inches above you an equally sized hole and above it a black hole as well. Imagining you could stuck your body inside of these holes.

Taking a deep breath you move your way upwards to the black hole. You don't know how this is going to turn out, but at least you tried. As soon as the top of your head touches the hole, your head automatically get sucked inside of it. Your arms and legs stretch out without your command pushing inside the black holes you saw before. Your body trembles more and more while you couldn't see anything. Then you feel it.

Opening your eyes again you catch a deep breath of fresh air. But then it hits you. Where are you? One moment you are in that tunnel and now here? You look around yourself and see the dark unfamiliar room where Anna is sleeping. But did that mean? You move your body a little, it does feel odd. Like it got itself shrunk and expanded at some places.

And then the fogginess appears. The whole room seems to turn around.

"What's going onnnn?" You slur. This feels awful.

I need to sleep. You think as you want to close your eyes to avoid looking at things like this. No, I can't. I need to find Squawg. We need to go to the airport. You keep thinking as well. It's a battle inside your mind as both sides want to win.

So who wins?
1111122111112.title: Anna's room.

11111221111121.content:
You manage to get up out of the bed that Anna was sleeping in, still a little drowsy and not used to the extra amount of weight on your new body you stumble a bit but catch yourself before you fall in the ground. You rub your eyes and look into the full sized mirror in the room and see the body of Anna O'neil, mother of April O'neil, it's a little weird seeing her through her eyes and pretty much nude (with only a transparent dress, bra, and panty preventing that). He took a long look around the room and notice her(or now your) husband still sleeping peacefully in bed, the urge to fall back to sleep with him is strong (and a bit arousing) but you persist and go and find squawg.


You tiptoe out of the room and go out into the hall where you no longer have to be as quiet and go and find squawg. You look in the kitchen and the living room but don't find him in either rooms, look in tge front and back yard to see if he went outside for some reason but don't find him their either. You start to worry if he left you and found another body to fulfill the mission he and him had started, but then come to the obvious conclusion that he probably went and possessed April and swiftly (but silently) went her room. You open the room that (using the memories of this new body) you now know to be April's, but when you get inside you find her still fast asleep and not bothered you then start panicking "if squawg isn't here where is he" you think to yourself.

You then hear a voice in frpnt of uou say "mom what are you doing in my room" you look forward in shock to see April staring at you half asleep. You decide to act it out and mabye get out of here as quickly as you can, "umm nothing sweetheart" you internally gag at having to call your bully 'sweetheart' "just checking on you". "Oh well okay but mom i was wondering if i could talk to ypu about something?"she said "umm okay" you walk over to your bully and new daughter and sit on her bed, April turns on her lamplight and begins talking "im having nightmares again,and its the same one over and over and over" you the reply "well what happens in this nightmare?" She then replies "an alien comes and abducts me into a space ship and does experiments on me" you then start to wonder if squawg had anything to do with this "then the alien puts me back and i tell everyone but no one believes me and then they lock me away in an insane asylum". You then reply "well its just a nightmare it won't hurt you, now get some rest you have a big day tomorrow" "okay thanks mom" "no problem" April then gives you a hug and you awkwardly give her one back. As you start to leave the room then slowly close the door you see squawg in the entrance of the door, you whisper "where have you been, squawg?" He replies with "I was looking for you, its a good thing i but a tracker on you it works even when your on a different body" he said proudly "okay but squawg be more careful next time" "i will human" " i think a found a body for you do you want it?" "Yes human i do" "okay its right there" as you point to......
11111221111121.title: You manage to keep awake.

111112211111212.content:
You point to April's room since you thought it would be pretty ironic since the nightmares had and alien (I guess), Squawg opens the door a tad and looks inside. You look in too noticing that April is now fast a sleep, it seems she was a quick sleeper. Squawg quietly and quickly sneaked up to the end of her bed, lifting up the bed sheets he turns to give you the thumbs up before disapearing underneath. You could see the sheets ruffle as he did his business, knowing exactly what was going on, the image of it happening to your mom practically burned into your brain. You watch as April begins to mumble something in her dreams before suddenly her eyes shoot open and that mischievous smile of squawg's spread across. With a large thrust he leaped out of bed and walked up to you gazing down at his new body. You never noticed before but April was actually pretty hot, you'd never previously had chance to, or wanted to, check out your tormentor. But now as she stood in front of you you had to say she looked sexy. She was wearing a black night shirt and long sweatpants both of which hugged against her curvy body showing off its shape.

"Well this is certainly a downgrade of age from the last body but she still has the same sexual organs." Squawg said as he cupped his new breasts.

You hadn't really really looked at your new body either you are just now noticing that the O'neil family all seem to be brunettes. Your knew hair fell right down to your stolen breasts of which were gigantic, Mrs. O'neil's having quite the rack feeling they're heavy weight pulling you forward slightly. Lower down you became overtly aware of your new lack of penis. Your arms smushed your large boobs inwards as you reach for your new vagina feeling the smooth empty space that was now there. This was amazing.

However Squawg didn't let you bask in this exploration for long. "Now that we have these new bodies we should go and get my space ship back, right?" He asked.

"Uh, no Squawg we can't just go out looking like this we need clothes that fit us and we need some other stuff. Oh and we need their passports?"

"Whats a passport?" Squawg asked curiously.

"Its like an ID but it verifies that you can travel" You tell him.

"Oh. I already have one!" Squawg says enthusiastically. Then much like earlier his borrowed mouth widened to unfathomable widths as his little head popped out.
"Squawg we..." You tried to stop him as his arm then reached up and entered deep into his own mouth before pulling something out which he promptly presented to you.

It was a glass looking ID card and on it was a photo of Squawg with some jibberish looking language next to it. "Ok well thanks for showing me your's but we need the passports of these two. Our current bodies." You told him gesturing between the two of you currently wearing the two curvy O'Neils bodies. Squawg slipped back into April's mouth re-asserting control of her face.

"Oh well where are they?" He asked back in April's voice.

"I don't know. Probably in my bodies bedroom." You told him then gesturing for him to follow you. "Be quiet.

Quietly you then sneak back into the master bedroom and, much to your luck, found your passports sitting in the bedside table. "Got them." You whisper to Squawg who gives you an enthused thumbs up. You then head over to the wardrobe and pull out some clothes. You look over and see that Mr. O'neil still fast asleep completely oblivious of the events that were unfolding around him wondering what he would think if both his wife and a daughter just suddenly left?

"What are we supposed to do about him?" You asked Squawg who stood eagerly by the door.

"We use my reality change device on him." Squawg said. Once again he appeared out of April's mouth and pulls out a device.

"Wait what does it do?" You asked nervously, Squawg now holding a particularly dangerous looking alien gun, ready to fire it at Mr. O'Neil.

"It make believe. Just zap him and he will believe what we tell him." Squawg tells you.

"Ok make him believe Mrs. O'neil has a business trip in England to attend and she can bring one person." you tell him and he types something on the device's interface "And she took April to show her how business is done." You finish whispering as Squawg continues to type, finishing moment's later and giving you the thumbs up.

With that Squawg takes the gun and points it at Mr O'Neil shooting a Green lazer beam straight at his head which resonates momentarily into a blinding light. As your vision clearly Mr O'Neil suddenly lurches up.

He looks over at you and Squawg, who is seemingly dressed in a grey t-shirt and a pair of ripped jeans. Your mind is blown as you glance down and find yourself now wearing a set of business attire, a tight white business shirt, black jacket and suit skirt with a pair of heels on your feet. You can also see two suitcases standing besides you. It must have been the reality device you realise as you look back up at an unphased Mr. O'Neil.

"Setting off on your trip?" He asked as if nothing was out of the ordinary.

"Um~ Yeah." You say nervously.

"Well you girls enjoy." He smiled, "Oh and turn the light off on your way out." He said, the light seemingly having turned on when reality was altered. You severely hoped that and your attire was the extent to what had changed.

Quickly you gestured for Squawg to leave as you followed him out turning the light off as you closed the door behind you.

"You could have warned me that was going to happen!" You moaned quietly to Squawg now out in the hall making your way through the house. "I nearly had a heart attack when he woke up."

"I didn't know he wake up." Squawg reasoned, "Never used on person asleep before."

"Well~" You're about to moan again, "Ah. Whatever it worked so let's just get out of here." You say finding the keys for the house and car are now in your hand, seemingly put there in the reality change as well as two airplane tickets in your other.

You blip open the large SUV which you knew was Anna's, throwing your luggage in the boot before hopping in. You twist the keys in the ignition and hear the car roar into action. Releasing the handbrake you hesitantly put your foot on the pedal and the car moved off. The only sort of vehicle you'd driven was a Go-Kart which actually was similiar to an automatic just much smaller. You were just thankful that it was the middle of the night and that the roads were empty. As you drove to the airport you decided to run through some ground rules with Squawg to avoid getting into any unessecary trouble.

"First don't take anything that's not yours. Second walk right behind me and try to keep quiet."

"Ok. Ok. I will blend in. Me not gonna act strange or weird." Squawg said still as enthusiatic as ever.

"I just don't want you to get caught Squawg. Other humans won't be as friendly as me. There are too many made up films out there about aliens killing human's ok."

"Oh is there one about the Roswell incident?" squawg then asked.

"Wait, what!"

"Oh nothing." Squawg swerved the question as you arrived at the airport. "Wow. Is this airport?"

"It is indeed, this is where our journey begins."
111112211111212.title: April's room

choices: Continue on ( pretty late to turn back)
Check out fully your new bod
1111122111112121.content:
You and Squawg continue driving until the get to the airport parking lot," this is where we park the car Squawg" you say to your possesive buddy. "Okay human, but what will happen to 'car' when we leave it here?" "Well i guess they either tow it or have someone take it home for us" you answer " ohhh then the reality changedevice will take care of it, human" says Squawg, which calms you down a whole lot due to the fact that you weren't sure yourself what would happen to the car. "Still not 100% sure on why your species even has those kind of devices" you say as you step out of the care and go for your luggage which Squawg does as well, "helps make things alot easier for us to do things, most of the time we use it on people who see us when we're observing this... um what do you himans call it again i said it before." "National park?" You blurt out trying to help your companion out with the word, "yah thats right, i think"

You start by getting your bags out of the trunk and squawg does the same except with his one bag of clothes passport and other things this body will need for travel. "Why do you humans have to pack so much into just one bag" asked Squawg after he has to heave his bag out of the trunk, "to make sure we don't forget anything important" you answer simply after you get both your bags out of the trunk. You say to Squawg one more rule that is just as important as the other ones "make sure you don't call me human or anything like that, okay Squawg call me something like mom or mother to not rouse any suspicion, alright" you finish, "yes MOM l, i won't call you human from this point on" Squawg says very excitedly, you give him a look but other than that he looks alright (still smiling like an idiot but by his standerds alright).

You make your way to the airport passport checkup but soon find that apparently your new work has good services, " Oh, Mrs. O'neil over here" a tall young man say's after spotting you in the crowd. Curious you make your way over to the man, he then says, "You don't need to take the regular air routes, Mrs. O'neil you can take the company private jet to your destination" he quickly explains, your starting to like this reality change device more and more.He leads you to the docking area to a small ( by airplane standerds) jet ready for take off, you hear Squawg say behind you " is that 'airplane'" "yes, but i didn't expect to have our own, jet you say very quietly to him.

You head on until the young man says "this is where i leave you, have a nice trip Mrs. O'neil and you to April, i've heard so much about you from your mother here" Squawg not sure on what to say just mumbles something under his breath in his native language, then suddenly the young man walks off without so much more then a second look. You look Squawg "what the just happened, he just walked off" you say surprised " I Used my 'suggestive reasoning' skills on him" says Squawg a little embarrased "wait you have that" you say " sorry its only an ability that my species has, not even the watch can duplicate it" he says firmly. "Alright we should get on board" you say, you and Squawg both get on and sit in the first seats together up front "these seats are comfy" Squawg says after adjusting into his seat a man then comes and askes fir their luggage which they oblige since truthfully it was starting to become a bother, soon they were of to England where they hopefully would find Squawg's ship.
1111122111112121.title: Continue to the airport

choices: You take over Tiffany and Squawg takes over Lydia.
Squawg takes over Tiffany and you take over Lydia.
111112211112.content:
The Johnson's home might be the best place for now. Lydia and Tiffany seemed like nice people. You overheard one of them saying they were going on their honeymoon soon so it could be the perfect opportunity. If only you could remember where it was they original planned. It was something weird, but you forgot it somehow.

"J-Johnny you know where we go?" Squawg asks you shivering. You nod your head as you nudge your head in the right direction. Squawg immediately sets off with you behind him. You're surprised how fast that little guy can run with those legs. Squawg stops in front of the front door and you almost run against him.

"W-What's wrong?" You ask him. Squawg looks at you confused. "You are earthling, you should enter first."

"Squawg we can't go through the front door. They probably locked down the place when they went to bed." You try to explain to Squawg as quietly as possible.

"But how do you enter home then?" He asks confused.

"I don't know, we need to look for someplace they haven't locked. Like a window or something like that." You tell him. It's then that you notice the front door. It seems open. You sign to Squawg to be quiet and push the door slightly and see it opening further.

You are way confused about this. How could they let the front door be open like that? It's unbelievable. While you are still thinking this through Squawg in his joy runs to the opened door and step inside the dark house.

"Squawg no." You tell him but it's too late. Squawg already went inside. You put your backpack down and quickly follow behind him. Luckily he hadn't gotten far as he's still standing in the hallway.

"Good." You tell him patting. He then turns his around and shakes his head. "No, not good. Feet are stuck." He says pointing to his feet. An unhealthy feeling comes over you and you try to move your feet, but they are stuck as well.

It's then that the light turns on and you hear stumbling from upstairs.

"Told you Tiff we could trap him." You can hear a voice shouting from excitement.

"I know, I know, Ly I shouldn't have doubted you." Another female voice shouts back.

From the stairs Lydia and Tiffany come down. They look surprised seeing Squawg but even more seeing you with him.

______________________________________________________________________


Fifteen minutes later you, Squawg, Lydia and Tiffany are sitting in the Johnson's living room. You, Squawg and Lydia are drinking a soda while Tiffany has a cup of tea for herself.

"That's quite some story." Tiffany concludes after you finish your story.

"Wow, amazing. It's like ET." Lydia says grinning.

"Well not exactly." You tell them as you all look at Squawg. He doesn't look anything like ET and especially not his intelligence.

"I know. If he would have paid more attention to his surrounding, he probably saw our trap." Tiffany points out.

You agree to that. It took a lot of pulling from Tiffanny and Lydia to free both you and Squawg.

"Yeah, I have to know. Why was it there in the first place?" You ask them.

"Well, to catch burglars for once. But it's also because Lydia is such an alien freak." Tiffany points out to which Lydia shakes her head.

"Yeah. I just love them. Can't help myself. I was supposed to disable the trap but after I saw that meteor shower I let it on just in case." Lydia says giggling.

"Meteor shower?" You ask confused. Lydia nods to which she picks up her phone and shows some pictures. These I made through my telescope, pretty neat huh?" You see a metallic object shining red. Squawg for some reason gets excited seeing them.

"That's ship, that's ship." He points out.

"No way." You tell him as you look at the photo's again. It doesn't look like it at all. But perhaps that's because it's pretty far away.

"Need to get ship, need to get ship." Squawg repeats himself.

"Okay, okay. Calm down Squawg." You tell him to which he sits down again and looks again at the pictures.

"So you need our bodies to find this guy or alien's ship?" Tiffany asks you.

"Yeah, well, not yours specifically, I mean not that you're bad looking, no that's not what I meant." You feel yourself getting hot.

"That's okay. I mean, we don't mind you telling us that. After all, you're going to spend some time in." Tiffany tells you.

"Wait what?" You exclaim.

"They want us to use their bodies?" Squawg asks.

"Yeah definitely. I mean, we gladly want to help him out." Lydia says smiling as she looks at Squawg jumping up and down.

"And you probably need all the help you can get." Tiffanny tells you.

"Thanks, I really mean it." You tell them both.

"We do want to get a thank you from him after this. Perhaps a souvenir?" Lydia asks.

"I'll see if I can get him to." You tell Lydia wondering if you can get something for yourself as well.

"So, you guys need to get to England and you need to get there fast. There is only one little problem." Tiffany explains. "I'm supposed to work tomorrow."

"Yeah, she works at some lawfirm. Jerks like that." Lydia rolls her eyes.

"That would mean that the person going to take my body will need to pretend to be me." Tiffany looks at you. "Does that device of yours have the ability to get my memories?"

"I don't know, Squawg?" You ask him.

He nods his head, but then explains. "Yes, device allows you to use memories from host, but is something that needs to be learned. Won't happen directly. I can see memories though." Squawg points at himself.

Tiffany looks a bit disturbed. Perhaps she assumed you would take her body? That leaves you with a big question, who takes over who? If you take over Tiffany than Squawg has to take over Lydia. It would be the more responsible choice, but you wouldn't have the same knowledge as Tiffany. Perhaps it was better to let Squawg take over Tiffany and you take over Lydia? Judging from Squawg's behavior though that you could lead to some interesting situations.
111112211112.title: Go to the Johnson house.

choices: "Of course I'm serious, let's do it."
1111122111122.content:
"I guess Squawg better takes over for you and I'll take over Lydia." You tell Tiffany.

"Yes, but um..." Tiffany looks slightly disturbed at the thought of an alien taking over her body.

"Oh come on Tiff, think how cool it will be. You will be remembered as the woman that hides one of the most wanted creatures in the universe." Lydia tries to cheer her up.

"Thanks, that makes me feel so much better." Tiffany rolls with her eyes at this remark.

"So, we go inside bodies now?" Squawg asks as he looks at you all.

"We better get this over with." Tiffany says as she stands up stiffly. "I'll take Squawg here to our room, will you manage yourself with Johnny in our spare room?"

"You betcha." Lydia says with a smile and winks at Tiffany. Tiffany shakes her head like she knows what Lydia is about to do, which makes you curious what it could be. Tiffany then leaves the room with Squawg in tow who is clapping in his hand.

"That Squawg is something alright." Lydia says as she watches Tiffany and Squawg leaving the room."I never thought an alien could be so...

"Kid-like?" You finish the sentence.

"Energetic, is what I would describe him. I don't know, I always imagined them more like Yoda, you know? All serious and shit like that."

Well by nearby you meant 4 miles. “Aww” You groaned. “Oh Uber.” You spotted the app as you closed Megan’s phone in a huff. With that you ordered an Uber and sat waiting down the street from your house. As you did you tried to search your mind for any clue for who Squawg could have possessed though you were worried that he could swap bodies into someone else and that you’d lose him for good and end up stuck as poor Megan.

‘BEEP’ ‘BEEP’

You heard the sound of a car horn tooting breaking you out of your worried thought. You headed over to it and hopped in the back seat.

“Are you Megan?” The driver asked.

“Yep that’s me” You sighed at the reminder as the driver pulled off.

A few minutes later and the car pulled up at the address you’d provided and you hopped out. It was small looking house on a row of attached, worn down houses. You knew from your sister that student houses weren’t that good, lucky for her she got to live at home. Unfortunately, that wasn’t the case for Megan and this was now your house until you could leave her body. Slowly walking up towards number 84, the number in the address, you prepared yourself to act as Megan, but you didn’t know anything about her. Inside there were going to be her friends who probably knew her extremely well. But then again who would guess that their friend was no longer herself and instead was being worn by some 16-year old school kid who’d accidently taken over her body because of a little alien that had landed in his garden. It was pretty farfetched.

“Alright you can do this Johnny. Sorry Megan if I make you look weird.” You apologize before you twisted open the handle and stepped inside. You found yourself stepping into a reasonably tidy but cheap looking house. Looking around anxiously nobody seemed to be here but the door was open, so somebody must have been.

“Hello.” You called nervously through the house. A few moments later you heard footsteps coming from the floor above. Taking a deep breath you prepared yourself for whatever was in store.

“Megan!” A girl said happily as she jogged down the stairs.

“Hi.” You said waving your best girly wave and standing there awkwardly after. You prepared for a hug as she reached the bottom of the stairs but as you raised your arms she rushed past you and into the kitchen.

“How was it then?” She asked as you followed behind her slowly.

“How was what? The party? It was alright.” You said casually watching as the girl stopped to open the fridge.

“I don’t care about the party. How was the… You know.” She hinted smirking knowingly. You however did not know what she meant. You stood in silence for a moment trying to think what on earth she could mean. “How was the sex? How was he? Was he fit?” The girl asked rapid fire finally breaking the silence.

‘Oh shit’ You cursed internally. That message you’d sent her. She thought Megan, you, had sex last night.

“Um yeah it was… Uh… Good.” You said nervously not really knowing what to say. You’d never even come close to having sex as yourself and you sure as hell didn’t know what to say about it as a girl.

“Oh not very good then?” She said sensing your hesitation. “Aw well. So it didn’t get you over Henry then?” She asked about someone. It was probably Megan’s ex or something, it was the best you had so you just went with it.

“Um... no. But whatever. I don’t care.” You said winging it hoping that it was Megan’s ex-boyfriend you were talking about. It seemed to work and the girl suddenly scurried over to you and wrapped you into a tight hug.

“I know Megan. You’ll find someone better.” She said as she squeezed tighter. You could feel Megan’s large breasts begin to hurt, still bruised after your fall. Just as suddenly as she’d started the hug she ended it, pulling away and heading back over to the sandwich that she was making. “So what are you doing tonight? Don’t you have work at 4? Surely you should be getting ready.” She suddenly dropped you with a bombshell.

“Work?” You blurted aloud. Quickly covering your mouth after you realized what had come out.

The girl laughed. “Ha yeah. You said yesterday you had work this evening.” She told you. “Did that guy shag a few brain cells out of you or something.” The girl joked noticing your worried face before she picked up her now finished sandwich and headed past you. “Anyway, my boyfriends over tonight so please do not disturb I haven’t seen him in a while so.” She grinned at you before leaving the room.

Now alone you raised your hands up to your head. “Fuck.” You said bluntly. Megan had work, or more so, you now had work. You pulled Megan’s phone out of her bag, it was 3:14. “Shit.”

“Where do you even work Megan?” You asked yourself trying to think of a way you could figure it out. “Oh. I know. Her uniform.” You exclaimed before turning and began quickly up the stairs looking for Megan’s room. Lucky for you the first door up from the stairs had the name Megan stuck on it in star stickers. “Jackpot.”

Swinging into the room and turning on the light you were greeted with a cluttered mess. There were clothes all over the floor some of which were panties and very large looking bras, the counter tops were littered with papers and make-up. You stepped through the mess over to the wardrobe pulling it open in search of some form of uniform for Megan’s work. It was just as messy with clothes piled up at the bottom. You opened some drawers only to find them filled with more bras, panties and some socks. You were gonna have to knead through the piles of dirty clothes. And so you did grabbing each item, checking it before throwing it onto the floor. “Why do you have to be so messy Megan?” You asked in disgust as you pulled out a crispy feeling top. “I thought girls were tidy.” You stated before you grabbed a shirt. Written across it were the words CinemaWorld. “This has got to be it.” You exasperated pleased. You knew the CinemaWorld, it wasn’t far from your house.

Once again grabbing your phone you checked the time, ‘3:25’. “Shit better get a move on.” You said as you step back and yank the dress you’d woken in over your head. Unable to not notice Megan’s large boobs as they jiggled into view the pale fleshy orbs being cradle in a large pink bra. You felt yourself growing a little excited at the sight but shook it off in respect for Megan’s privacy, also due to the fact you were expected at work in 30 minutes. Quickly grabbing the top you gave it a smell check, popcorn and a slight girl scent, it wasn’t too bad so you threw it on. Then grabbing some jeans off the floor nearby you pulled them on before checking your reflection in the mirror. Megan looked tired, her make up was slightly smudged and her hair was disheveled. You tidied up your hair before accepting that it would have to do. And with that you called and Uber and headed out the door.
1412.title: Go back to your new house.

choices: Possess Steph Tsunade at the buffet table
142.content: Squawg would head towards the city, where there were cars passing by and a large crowd of people partying nearby, amongst which were a bunch of teenage girls talking cluelessly about clothes, boy-bands and shopping. Seraphine and her best friend Keliare were lounging at a nearby pool where a beach party was happening. Nearby, at a buffet table, Stephanie Tsunade was nomming all of the cheeseburgers, and chowing down on almost everything there. A guitarist called Stan Carlos was strumming energetically as Squawg looks clueless at everything happening there.
142.title: Future of the city.

choices: Take his offer to join him
Try and hide him for the night, try tomorrow
143.content:
You push past the gate of your backyard to trail along behind Squawg after hurdling himself over the ledge with ease and finesse that contradicted what he could do with that over sized melon of a head bobbing about as he ran along side the house with it's over grown foliage proving to stall the green little alien a bit for your to hobble behind, wishing you had put on some kind of flip flop of slippers due to the sting of the little rocks jabbing your foots underside along with the creeping squash of the over saturated mud splashing against your skin while exerting your strength to brush aside the taller bushes teeming with god knows how many spiders or bugs resting in the night.

Huffing and wincing so fast from your belly jostling between the heavy awkward thuds from having to jump over the bulged roots of the tree's as Squawg drags you alone through the small protected forest pocketing the spaces between the neighborhoods leaving your nostrils to inhale the rich fresh mildew of the leaves and ground and the bitter pinch of...sulfurous smoke as you cry out to Squawg, ""W-wait...wait!? Where are we gooooooiiinnng!?" You holler out to the backside of your companion as he simple raises his large hand and waves it forward.

"There! There, Ship there!" He shouts out in his gargled speech from his vocals not being used to more tones and nasal sounds of the human language as his tries to push the foliage away enough to make the path clearer for you, but the gesture is lost as your chubby cheeks flush from the rush of blood and discomforting sweat while squawg lets out an excited ear stinging screech. "Here here!...Worse than thought!?" He shouts upon leaping over a bush leaving you to catch up a bit to the trail of strong sulfurous smoke and a bit of lumination from a glowing light, stumbling along the root rich ground before bursting out into the open space filled with the dim blue light leaving you stunned and staggered in shock...and awe.

Before you is the 90 degree angled saucer of Squawg partially buried in the earthen mud with most of it's lights dim of flickering off and it's wide...strange jet like thrusters puffing out the remnants of smoke and vapor while it's round silver and bronze material shape lays dents and pot holed from it's rough impact with it's notable hole being the large inward puncture the size of a SUV in its broadside with another hole being the detach from the escape pod that Squawg rode on down with...amazed as even in it's damaged state the ship still looked advanced and sleek where it isn't dinged while Squawg ran laps around it. "Found it, found it! b-but no good, fly possible, no!" He shouts and stops in front of you with his big dark eyes glistening with joy while waving his hands to get your attention. "Friend, friend we fix, fix, squawg stay till fix!" He shouts.

However, you remained staggered till your eyes slowly dragged down to his face, "U-uh...a lot of questions, s-so many questions dude uhm..." You stammer as he nods, rather willing to entertain the idea of questions as you dragged your eyes along the ships surface noticing the large bubble top cockpit colored in a way to appear flat from some perspective. "How....how did this even happen dude?" You ask as he looks over at the ship and taps on his chin(?) before responding sorrowfully.

"Ship pass, looking visit earth, meet human, have good time, rock big evade shield..." He says, trying to think of a better way to explain it, "Puncture haul, engine stop working and free fall on earth, squawg drop, no want die" He says shaking his head along with his finger before pointing at the exit hole from the escape pod. "Meet friend, meet you!, you help squawg!" He says, brightening up once again which makes your body jerk.

"Uh, I-I don't know a damn thing about cars, bikes, let alone freaking alien ships!...also that had to be a big fucking ROCK" You say emphasizing with some doubt thinking some kind of observatory would make an astroid big enough to knock a ship out of orbit known for people to check out...but Squawg keeps his smile and nods.

"Yeah yeah! Big, big like plasma!...you help, show squawg how be human, live like human, gather material to build ship..look look!" He shouts and grabs your wrist needing little strength to even tug you along along the scorched mud around the ship with a heavy bob and lean of your body to peer inside the big gaping hole on the ships side. "Burn like plasma, scare squawg bad!"he says while you jerk back again seeing the searing molten red metal drip down through the hole that barely punctures through the other side exposing much of it's halted mechanical bits and open compartment where squawg would probably be moving through.

"Cripes!?..h-how in the hell are you gonna fix this?" You ask as squawg lets go of your wrist to carefully climb inside, mumbling some strange sounds before climbing further into the hole before seeing his green head and tush trying to slip on into the compartment of his own ship while his voice echoes. "Easy...not easy hard, really hard but doable! Squawg find material, fix but need friend help...again!" He says as you let out a sigh of frustration before looking over the ship again till the loud thud of a metal toaster like object comes flying out sending you jumping back before a few more objects are tossed out from metallic tubes to what looks like equipment and collars with a few silver ad black rubber suits being tossed out before he comes squirming on out with with a head band like object hanging off his wrist, a necklace with a little glowing control like appearance and what looks like legitimate car keys as he hopes up to you with glee. "So help?"

He says, leaving you a bit staggered but not too staggered as you did offer your help to him...even if the situation is beyond fucking insane by any circumstance as your eyes glances at the ship again with it's engine puffing out one last plume of smoke as you run both your hands along the sides of your head. "Gaaaaah fuck man...o-okay I guess...I mean I don't want to know what will happen if I say no but i'll help you get uh a disguise...yeah? a-also what the heck do you have?" you ask while thinking of what kind of disguise he needs...and how goofy it'd look to see squawgs tiny frame sporting a rain coat and fedora.

"Oh! key, cloak ship while fix! Necklace phone, this?" He lifts up his wrist to dangle the head band like object. "This for you, if want disguise with squawg, yeah yeah!" He says with a bit of a bounce to his feet.
143.title: His ship which had crash landed nearby.

1431.content:
Squawg hands you the metal head band object, you could tell from the mischievous grin splattered across his face that he was excited about what it could do. This made you rather anxious and so hesitantly you took it from his hand.

“Put on!” He said, “On head!” his squeaky voice sounding eager yet demanding.

Slowly and anxiously you raised the foreign object over your head letting the metallic object hover above it momentarily, preparing yourself for something unexpected, as much as Squawg’s innocent personality made you to trust him you couldn’t help but be aware that he was still an alien and you’d only just met him. Yet against your better judgement, finding yourself too growing rather eager to explore this alien gadget, you dropped it down onto your head flinching as you did expecting to be shocked by electricity or something similar… But nothing. You were still alive, and miraculously still felt totally normal.

“Good! Now where do we go? Need disguise?” Squawg asked rapidly spinning his head looking for somewhere to go whilst you felt around at the metal headband that now seemed lodged firmly on your head.

“Don’t you have any clothes that can hide you?... Or some gadget?... Is this thing supposed to be so tight?” You asked him quick fire, one after another, however the little green alien wasn’t listening having spotted something off in the distance.

“Over there!” He said hopping up and down and pointing into the darkness of the forest. Through the black silhouettes of tree’s and off a few hundred meters in the distance you could see a house, illuminated by a garden light.

“Why do we need to go there?” You asked him puzzled, you had no clue who lived there so saw no reason to go there other than to steal something from them, or even worse kill whoever lived there. Beginning to grow fearful of what the intentions of your new alien friend were. Especially as you saw him raised up his arm holding the phone-like-gadget and pointed it towards the house, watching as a bright green laser shot out the end hitting directly into a window of the house. “Squawg no!” You shouted in fear. But it was too later as he poked a finger firmly down on the screen. However, nothing shot out the end of the gadget like you’d expected instead you felt yourself go light headed as you suddenly felt yourself lurch forward suddenly finding yourself in somewhere completely different.

“What the f…” You began but before you could finish the little alien had latched onto your mouth, covering it shut, muffling your words. This gave you chance to see your new surroundings. You were in a bedroom, it was dark but in front of you you could see two people sleeping in a large double bed. Squawg released you mouth as you froze in fear of waking the people up, you essentially being an intruder in what was clearly their home.

“Teleportation…” Squawg suddenly said quietly too you, tapping on his head gesturing to your head band. You grabbed the top of your head feeling the cold metal object. “What the fuck!” You mouthed silently completely amazed at what was happening to you.

“Now shrink.” Squawg squeaked quietly whilst grinning at you. He then raised his wrist to press a button on his watch at which moment you instantly felt light headed again though this time there was no lurch, or pulling sensation. Instead you tingled all over as you point of view suddenly began to get lower… and lower… and lower. Glancing down at your body watching it shrink in front of your very eyes it finally stopping once you were literally half a centimeter tall finding yourself struggling to stand in the now body length fluff of the carpet. You managed to climb on top of it, seeing Squawg also on top of it off in the distance, he was using that strange laser again, pointing it towards the sleeping couple.

You knew this roller coaster ride of terrible feelings, teleportation and shrinking wasn’t over as you suddenly felt light headed again followed by a rapid lurch forward. The next thing you knew you were stood right next to Squawg on some soft pinkish material. Recovering from you light headed disorientations you look up gob smacked to see what was in front of you. It was a gigantic nose, the nostrils of which looked like two huge dark tunnels. Bewildered you stepped back only to find your foot slipping down a deep chasm, turning to look behind you were amazed to find that the chasm was in fact a huge mouth finding your face blown by a strong gust of wind as the mouth let out a feminine snore. You quickly regained your footing and stepped back turning to Squawg.

“What the fuck is going on?” You asked your mind absolutely boggled.

“We are tiny, this is human.” He said pointing up towards the giant nose and eyes in front of you.

“W-w-w…Why?” You stuttered finding it hard to speak due to the surrealness of the situation your brain finding it hard to comprehend.

“Follow me. I’ll show you!” Squawg said that, now unnervingly happy, grin once again on his face. You watched your brain melting even further as he wondered casually into the dark tunnel of the huge persons left nostril. Not really wanting to be left alone as a small person you followed on after Squawg who seemed to know what he was doing hesitantly entering the dark tunnel. You jogged after him to catch up, seeing him in front with a torch illuminating from his wrist as well as some sort of map hologram of what you assumed to be the human anatomy.

You followed the little green alien for what seemed like a mile or so through dark sticky tunnels finding it amazing that not 1 hour ago you were lying in bed struggling to sleep and now you’d met an alien and were currently wondering around as a tiny person inside the body pipes of some random sleeping stranger.

“Here we are!” Squawg suddenly announced as he turned a corner, you quickly followed on turning to see a bright pink mass of flesh sat in the middle of a small chamber illuminated by Squawg’s bright torch which was now on the floor as he ruffled around in the little back pack he’d brought for something. He pulled out a small metal toaster looking object, though you suspected it was probably more advanced than that.

“What is this?” You asked as you stared in awe at the large mass of pulsating flesh.

“It is the brain stem my device tells me. It is key to your functioning.” Squawg tells you smiling as he takes the metal object, you could see two large prongs poking out of it which he promptly stabbed into the mass of flesh.

“Wait! This isn’t going to kill them is it?” You asked after he’d already attached the object to the mass of flesh.

“No the host will be just fine.” He said then stepping back a few steps and pressing button on his wrist. You watched as out from the object sprung a large control panel followed by…
1431.title: Get Squawg a disguise

1432.content:
You watch him bounce up and down with excitement while waiting for your answer, which in a sense made your chubby belly squirm a bit in a sense of anxiousness since an advanced alien should no more about what to do than you yourself! Though it also provides security that he couldn't possibly be trying to pull the wool over your eyes... or so you think before opening up your mouth to speak. "Well..u-uh I'm already in deep huh?" You ask, thinking back to when the last time you got tugged too far into someones plans it lead to you getting your cheek slapped by your mother and sweets denied for a few weeks, though it's not like it stalled the bit of pudge you gained in the end. "I-I'll try it out. BUT this won't mess me up bad will it...like, n-no weird body morphing or Men in Black stuff?" You ask, losing Squawg a bit on the men and black reference as he tilts his head and holds the head band up to you with a bit of bounce from him motioning is hands.

"Men in black??? creatures, monsters? head band fine! Should keep safe, put on Squawg explain, show you!" He says, his broken English still grating on the ears but even with the brief time spent with him so far the style of speech he has is becoming gradually tolerable. "Though...human brain not strong, Squawg stronger, harder to steal body, harder stay in!" He shouts, though his cheesy grin spreading wider on his face hints to his excitement, perhaps curious as to see how a human can handle possession. However you're left wondering and even wincing, backing away slightly from his statement. To Sqawg stealing a persons body was his term for getting a disguise which took on a rather unpleasant... but also curious meaning.

Hesitant, you reach out slowly and nab the cold silver head band between your pudgy fingers, pinching it hard with a yank to tug it away from Squawg so you could investigate it. "D-disguise is taking someones body, I-I...I don't want to start second guessing but you mean w-w'e're kidnapping people!?" You accidentally shout making the green creature jump up and giggle with a wag of his finger, probably used to hearing that kind of reaction from different species while you gaze at the band. It was thick and silver and had the smooth touch of metal against your thumb while it ran around it's edges and yet it was as soft as the cotton sheets on your bed with the soft pulsation of neon blue lighting up the circuitry inside the thing while the center housed a bead sized green bulb sitting in a little pitted spot of metal... the mid section connected... giving it more of a thong look. You stretched it out with both hands then shooting Squawg another curious look. "If this screws me up and turns me into a monster your the first I'm eating..."

"Nonsense! turn on when think, not just wear!" He says watching you like an expecting parent getting ready to teach their son the wonders of their own hobby. You gulped loudly and hard enough to cause discomfort to your chest while the tingling warmth spikes around your skin contradicting the cooling sensation from your sweat as you raise the head piece up and slip it on top of your skull feeling it squeezing gently around your head as the thread like piece digs into the top of your head on top while waiting in silence till Squawg jumps up and taps your forehead. "Make noise, you fine now lets go, go go! too much noise tonight!" He says with a soft chuckle before tapping his bottom making the ships engine puff out another bloom before it's smooth metallic surface blotches out of existence leaving nothing but an impact crater and the few clothes and boxes Squawg had tossed out.

"W-what the..!? h-hey dude what the hell!?" You respond as the gem on the band flickers with a dull glow that leaves a trail of faint light from your body bobbing around. from the shock and low rumble of the ships last functioning bits of engine and machinery trying to enter low power mode to retain the cloak up.

"Ship hidden! No time though, idea idea for disguise? Think hard, fast, better human friend!" He says, his feet moving some dirt around on the ground with impatience leaving you at the discomforting wheel to figure everything up.

"Gah...fuck I think...I think we can try..."

"No time,

"I think we should go to my house" you say as you both ahead there, as you find when you get there someone is already up and is downstairs, you and put squawg behind the couch to hide and then you see one of your family members come out of the kitchen and see you.

Its....
14321.title: My house!

14323.content:
You stare down at Squawgs expecting face as he jumps up and down and place displacing the dirt around his own feet before you get a little bit of an idea. Not a bad one at that but not really anything amazing as well since the results could be a bit mixed as the idea of showing Tom the device and squawg could at least provide you with some back up...and honestly ensure that you haven't just lost your mind or are in some kind of really intricate hard to wake out of nightmare. "I uh...we're gonna go to my friends house, Tom or er, Tom Daniels for you I guess?" You say to squawg, expecting some kind of rejection to introducing another human int othe mix but it only seem to feed his excitement.

"Tom Daniels, human, human like you, help ship!?" He says as you jerk away awkwardly towards the foliage...needing to get on out from the sight fast and workout something before sunrise given that the night sky is still illuminated by milky see of the moons hanging surface...god knows what your mother or pop might do seeing you missing from the house. "Or disguise...squawg see few human, few look big, comfy even!" He says while trailing along behind you, being a bit more courteous to stay by your side and brush away the twigs and leafs with his feet while your own body throbs with some soreness around the knees from having to chase the little freak..and also loose from your muscle getting some oxygen and exercise for once.

"Urk...thanks, and no...I think?" You say, brushing aside some of the thick pushes to wiggle along the slightly trampled path the both of you had taken while the backsides of the houses...appear to actually be closer than you honestly thought. "I mean, he CAN help us if he doesn't freak out, like we both have the same interests and ideas and shit b-but even seeing YOU made me question myself...don't know how he will react but having him on our side might help for finding parts?" You say, knowing well Tom is about as knowledgeable on sci-fi ships as yourself but even with his knowledge on motors and engines, something like finding parts for a ship or even deciphering what the fuck kind of engine it has would be too much of a herculean task.

However, you shake your head and try to cast to the doubt from your mind while the walk comes a bit shorter than it felt running through as you over arm swing at a bush to clear the path bringing you both almost face to face with the fences of your home, Warners, and to the right Toms house with it's green fence losing much of it's paint to some weathering. "Alright...t-that ws actually faster than I thought...Squawg, see that house?" You say, looking over your shoulder to see the green little alien fussing and squirming to get out of the bushes before popping out and resuming his little grin.

Following the directing of the tilt to your head towards toms house, "Yeah! Toms dwelling!...what about it?" He asks already shuffling towards the gate leaving your stomach to pinch and your feet to move forward a bit.

"N-no wait...uh, so game plan!" You say, making Squawg halt and look up to you again. "W-we can't really just walk on in there..everyone is asleep and NOT as open as him and I got it?" You say as he keeps his big black eyes targeted onto you in silence before slowly nodding. "O-okay uh shit how are we gonna get in th-ah!" You say pointing your finger up in the air. "So! Toms room is on the bottom floor so we just got to get over the fence b-but I uh got a bit of a problem..." You say, making Squawg tilt his head to the side as you swallow hard and try to ignore your pride while sliding your hands along the round shape of your chubby belly with a squish of your fingers at the edges to emphasize it's shape. "I uh...this is called fat f.a.t and it's gonna keep me from going over the fe-"

You got cut off from the light chuckle from squawg with his big hands and thick long fingers grabbing you at the wrist with a rough tug jerking you towards the fence, "No problem, Squawg strong, Squawg lift friend, like this!" He says as you stumble behind him without seeing the bicep of his arm and his forearms swelling a bit.

"Gah, squawg what are you talking a-aaah!?" You shout with the whole world turn to a blur while form the outside what is scene is your pudgy body being over arm lifted and dropped off on the other side of the fence leaving your ass to crash onto the floor in Toms backyard with a hard thud leaving your cheeks to stick and your breathe to get knocked out a bit. "Grrrrk f-fuuuuuuuck..." you grown in pain and kick your feet against the ground, wanting so badly to cuss out loud if it weren't for the fact that you were now in your friends backyard with it's own little garden made by Tom's mother or the wooden Jacuzzi humming on the cement patio with it's top covering the bubbling waters while the sliding door leading to the living room carries the dull blue glow of a television while the two windows on its side marks the kitchen dining area while the one on the far right slightly cracked up with it's wrinkled curtain is Toms room while squawg vaults on over and stick the landing barely pivoting his torso to look at you with two thumbs up.

"See, squawg strong, just tiny...big head, kind of lazy sometime?" He says, looking between you and the window before pointing at you and towards the window again. "Waste time, lets go..."

You sit up right, feeling the bits of grass and mud falling off your backside leaving some cold spots here and there with a wobbling rise to your and a stagger towards squawg, "Yes...a really good arm, too good you jerk."

"Jerk, jerk new word?" he says as you grumble and pass him up while the clumps of grass falls off your ass with your motions being stopped to gently knock on the glass of the window."

"Just, shush I'll teach you later...c'mon I now you're in there dude." You say, knocking on the glass again a bit harder..."
14323.title: My friends house!

143233.content:
As you knock on the door, it unlocks. It appears that the Daniels may have forgotten to lock up properly the night before.

The two of you sneak over to Tom’s room. Since the door was open, you peer in and notice that Tom is asleep in his bed.

Squawg looks up at you before asking, “That Tom?”

“Yes, that’s my friend”, you whisper back. “Let’s look upstairs before we decide what to do.

You continue up the stairs and stop at the door of Emily’s room. You look into her room and see that she’s also asleep. You continue forward to their parents room and, unsurprisingly, they’re also asleep. Squawg taps your leg to get your attention.

“I have a few plan. You take young girl and I possess your friend Tom. As brother and sister we can spend more time together and I can fix my spaceship with your help. We could also possess the parents, me father and you mother, as they also spend long time together”, he says.

“How come I have to be the girl?”, you retort.

“I am already outsider to your world. To imitate better I should atleast share sex with target”, Squawg replies.

You think it over and realize that he’s right. However, you’re not sure which plan to choose.
143233.title: The Sliding door unlocks

choices: The woman is being heavily influenced by Sqwuag
144.content:
You tried your best to keep up with the tiny green alien man who was surprisingly fast for his size, you climbed over the same fence he did, increasing your speed to catch up to him.

"Um... your welcome mr..?" you didn't know if he as guy or a girl, or something else as you didn't know what he is apart from he's an alien.

"Oh. I am sqwuag, a scientist conducting research on your planet and speices when my ship suffered a major malfunction."

"Nice to meet you sqwuag. I'm Johnny." you said stretching your hand out to him, he looked at it with confusion, studying it before doing the same with his hand where you grasped it and started to shake it.

You honestly couldn't believe you were doing this, shaking hands with a real life alien.

After letting go of his hand, which was hard for you to do as you didn't want to, he once again smiled at you "Many thanks again Johnny. now about rewarding you." he trailed out before motioning for you to follow him which you did.

You both walked back to the crater where his ship was and followed after him in the large ditch till you came upon it.

It was an oval sharp ball of black sliming goo that coated the surface of large ball that was the size of an extra large bean bag chair as it sat within the middle of the crater.

"I'm came here to conduct tests on your planet's native species with these prototype gadets that were made to aid species in a varitity of ways but mostly breeding." he explained as to his presence here on your planet before he plunged his arm into the ship and feel around for something till he found it.

"I've got something here for you."

what does he pull out?
15231.title: Gadget tester

152311.content:
From out of the ship, Sqwuag pulled out... a gun that looked almost like a revolver but a shiny silicone finish on it's plastic looking body with pink glowing hearts embedded on the side and front of the barrel.

"What is that?" you asked, as you stared at the gun he held out to you.

"This is the YX Hipno-Gun or Gal Gun if you will." he introduced the gun as he handed it right to you, it was surprising how light it was compared to it's size as you held it in you hand.

"This Prototype gun was design to shot out a heart shaped energy bolt so as to not scare the targets. those shot will immediately fallen head over heels for the shoot no matter what, any other mates they have are immediately erased and replaced with the shooter, the female will recognised the shooter as their mate." he explained before delving in further "It was designed to help in aiding species with low birth ratio's and decline in population so it has a number of side affects when used on targets such as increased fertility to a 100%, sudden or accelerated pregnancy when used on a target who is already developing or filled with male genetic material. increase in hormones and Territorial instincts."

"Wait! what was that last one?" you asked as you tried to hear him right when h Territorial Instincts and what they meant on woman who have been hit by this thing.

"You don't need to worry about that." he waved it off and gave you a reassuring smile "you just have some fun, i'll be going now." he said before diving straight into his ship and flying off in heart beat, leaving you alone in the crater with your new... toy.

"Well... that was something." you breathed out this was both a weird and exciting experience for you, looking down at the gun he gave you, you started at the "now what to do with this?"
152311.title: The YX- Hipno-Gun (Gal Gun)

info.brief_description: A crash landed alien possesses the bodies of earthlings in order to stay alive.
info.description:
Johnny Watson was just like any other 16-year-old teenager but one day, during a night of restless sleep he makes a discovery that changes his life forever. In his back garden he discovers an alien who’d crash landed on earth having ejected from his wrecked ship. When it turns out the alien is friendly Johnny vows to help him find his ship but the first port of call for Squawg is to find a new body to hide in and for Johnny that means watching somebody he knows getting possessed by the little space man.

Who he possesses and what happens next is up to you? Will they ever find the aliens ship? Or is Squawg destined to spend the rest of his life on earth wearing the bodies of the people around him? You decide.

Characters:

Squawg: An alien from outer space. Comes from a highly intelligent race of aliens but is a little but its safe to say he isn’t too smart. He knows little about earth and his curiosity to learn more about the planet that he has crash landed on is constantly getting him into trouble much to the annoyance of Johnny. He looks like a typical mainstream alien, 4-foot-tall, green in color with a big oval shaped head and skinny gangly limbs.

You (Johnny Watson): You’re a slightly below average 16-year-old boy, in year 11 at high school. You have a nice way about you but can be mischievous at times. Due to your poor athleticism and average looks you get picked on by those looking for someone to torment, mainly Alfie. Your best friend is Tom who you share your passions for Fortnite, and big breasted women. You’re on the shorter and pudgier side and have short brown hair which you sweep over to the side and blue piercing eyes. You’re into all that supernatural and sci-fi stuff which is why when Squawg lands in your garden you’re more curious than scared.

Sally Watson: Your 43-year-old mother. Works as the nurse at your high school but is forbidden from helping you at school. She is a kind lady however she can be stern when she wants to be. Lucky for you she’s only mildly attractive so the boys at school don’t wind you up about her. She is relatively short, has dark brown shoulder length hair and greeny-blue eyes. Maybe it was because you’d never looked at her in a sexual way or perhaps it was because she was exceptionally good at covering them up but unbeknownst to you and your friends your mom was absolutely stacked.

Matt Watson: Your 45-year-old dad. A tall, burly man standing at about 6ft 4in, unfortunately none of his size had been passed on to you. He was usually quite busy at work, though he earned his own business so got to decide when he wanted to work, which at the moment seemed like all the time. He was very strict with you, always forcing you to work harder, you knew he just wanted the best from you but it really did anger you.

Georgina Watson: Your 19-year-old sister. Can really wind you up at times though you generally get along well with her. She attends a local college to study acting having left your school just last year. She stands at 6ft having inherited your dad’s height has long brown hair and dark green eyes. She has a curvaceous body and hanging from her chest she has two large breasts which she, much like your mom, doesn’t like to show off.

Tom Daniels: Your best friend. He was 16 but for his age was, unlike you, reasonably well built being 6ft tall and having some relatively large muscles. He played in the soccer team and was accepted by the ‘cool’ kids though he preferred hanging around with you. You’d been friends with him since year 2 and share a lot of the same interests. He has medium length light blonde hair which he leaves unkempt not seeming to care much what other people thought about how he looked, which amplified his modesty seeing as he was still a pretty good-looking guy, having a fair few girls who had crushes on him over the years. He lives right next door to you.

General:

- Try keep chapters to a good length.
- Keep characters and events consistent.
- Swinging of both ways is fine.
- Try to keep grammar good, though I'll try correct any mistakes.
- POV can be changed.
- The alien can possess people in any way you want, get imaginative!
- The alien can have more powers than just possession.
- Have fun with it!
info.pretty_title: A Visit From a Little Green Man
